activity.title: COMPOSE A CONTRASTING PERIOD
activity.description: Given the first two measures of an antecedent phrase, complete the contrasting consequent phrase by dragging the correct measures to the staff.

activity.title: NON-CHORD TONES
activity.description: Identify the circled note as a chord tone, passing tone, or neighbor tone using the picker.

activity.title: HARMONIC PROGRESSIONS
activity.description: Analyze the following short melody and identify the implied harmony from the options below.

activity.title: TYPES OF MOTION
activity.description: Identify the type of motion between these two lines using the picker below.

activity.title: CLUSTER, QUARTAL, AND POLYCHORDS
activity.description: Identify the type of chord from the picker below.
